tool.name: qiime feature-table merge
tool.command:
qiime feature-table merge

#if str($poverlapmethod) != 'None': --p-overlap-method=$poverlapmethod #end if
--o-merged-table=omergedtable ; cp omergedtable.qza $omergedtable

param.label: --i-tables: PATH List[FeatureTable[Frequency]] The collection of feature tables to be merged. [required]
param.name: additional_input

tool.help:
Combine multiple tables #######################
Combines feature tables using the `overlap_method` provided.
Parameters ---------- tables : List[FeatureTable[Frequency]] The collection of feature tables to be merged. overlap_method : Str % Choices('error_on_overlapping_sample', 'error_on_overlapping_feature', 'sum'), optional Method for handling overlapping ids.
Returns ------- merged_table : FeatureTable[Frequency] The resulting merged feature table.
